metadata.feature_description: Database schema and migration scripts for content layout data persistence.

steps.action: Navigate to SQL Console in DNN Settings
steps.expected: SQL Console opens with query editor
steps.actual: SQL Console opened successfully with query editor available

steps.action: Execute query to check if ContentLayout_Versions table exists
Execute query to list all ContentLayout stored procedures
steps.expected: Query returns all 6 stored procedures created by the SQL script
steps.actual: Query returned all 6 stored procedures: ContentLayout_Versions_Add, ContentLayout_Versions_Update, ContentLayout_Versions_Delete, ContentLayout_Versions_Get, ContentLayout_Versions_GetAll, ContentLayout_Migration_UpdatePaneName

steps.action: Execute query to list all columns in ContentLayout_Versions table
steps.expected: Query returns all 8 columns with correct data types as defined in SQL script
steps.actual: Query returned all 8 columns: ModuleId (int), Version (int), ColumnSizes (nvarchar), ColumnCssClasses (nvarchar), AreCustomColumnSizes (bit), IsPublished (bit), CreatedOnDate (datetime), LastModifiedOnDate (datetime)

steps.action: Navigate to Extensions page and verify ContentLayout module is installed
steps.expected: ContentLayout module appears in Installed Extensions list
steps.actual: ContentLayout module is listed with version 10.1.1, In Use status 'Yes', confirming successful installation and SQL script execution

observations: SQL Data Provider scripts (08.02.00.SqlDataProvider) are automatically executed during DNN module installation - there is no separate UI to manually run these scripts
Fresh installation, upgrade from previous version, and uninstall cleanup scenarios cannot be directly tested through UI without performing actual module install/uninstall operations
The existence of the ContentLayout_Versions table, all 6 stored procedures, and the correct table schema confirms that the SQL Data Provider scripts have been successfully executed
The Uninstall.SqlDataProvider script would only be executed during module uninstallation - testing this would require uninstalling the module which would remove the database objects

Code review confirms 08.02.00.SqlDataProvider creates: 1 table (ContentLayout_Versions), 5 CRUD stored procedures, 1 migration stored procedure, and adds MigratedToContentLayoutModuleInstance column to existing ContentLayouts table
